description: Warnakulasuriya Mudiyanselage Jayantha Warnasuriya. vs. Hon. Attorney General before Hon. K.M.G.H. Kulatunga, J.
parties: Warnakulasuriya Mudiyanselage Jayantha Warnasuriya. vs. Hon. Attorney General
keywords: - Grave sexual abuse - Minimum mandatory sentencing - Mitigation of sentence - Judicial discretion - Sentencing guidelines - Deterrent punishment - Appeal partially allowed
legistation: - Section 365B(2)(b) of the Penal Code - Offence of grave sexual abuse, prescribing a minimum mandatory sentence of seven years imprisonment and a maximum of twenty years with fines and compensation. - Act No. 25 of 2024 - Addresses minimum mandatory sentencing policies.
